bio.heading: Who is Jay?
description: Back in 2020, I decided to try my hand at creating custom Graphics and Illustrations in Designinig Company and Design Pickle head first into the rabbit hole of Graphic Design and Custom Illustrations.

And Then I change my mind, Fast forward to today, I've built products for companies and businesses around the world, ranging from marketing websites, startups, to enterprise apps with focus on fast, elegant and user friendly experiences.
When I'm not coding, I'm regularly playing Forza Horizon, both online, practicing Vollyball and making music.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: Focusing on providing a better experience for FalconX clients by delivering high-quality, robust production code for Prividox and Artificial Intelligence; an FalconX FalconX AI & ML System.

experience.title: Cybersecurity Analyst Intern
experience.description: Completed identity and access management (IAM) for Tata Consultancy Services, collaborating with a Cybersecurity Consulting team, Acquired expertise in IAM principles, cybersecurity best practices, and strategic alignment with business objectives, Delivered comprehensive documentation and presentations, showcasing the ability to communicate complex technical concepts effectively.

experience.title: Python Developer Intern
experience.description: Focus on deep, long-lasting client relationships and strong domain expertise, Building Software architecture and logic with python and django, building custom RESTful APIs with fllask framework, Creating admin porta for administration which provides CRUD operations.

experience.title: Graphics Designer
experience.description: As a Graphics Designer at Design Pickle, I conceptualized and executed compelling visual designs, collaborated with clients to understand their vision, and delivered high-quality graphics across a range of projects, contributing to the overall creative success of the team.

education.description: Courses in Sofwarre Design, Software Tools and Systems Programming and Theory of Computation, Programming languages like C, Java, Python and Web Development with Cloud Computing.
